flawed_nl_solution:
He sells each computer for 1.4*800=$<<1.4*800=1120>>1120
That means he makes a profit of 1120-800=$<<1120-800=320>>320 per computer
So he makes 320*60=$<<320*60=192000>>192000 from selling computers
He has extra expenses of 5000+3000=$<<5000+3000=8000>>8000 a month
So his profit is 192000-8000=$<<192000-8000=184000>>184000
#### 184000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19200, not 192000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
